Battling his way through problems, he heads to China to fight a dreaded disease spread in a small village. 

"Tomorrow Never Dies" is another classic espionage film from 1992, directed by Tom Brokaw and starring Michael DeLorenzo as Lt Daniel Kaffee. The movie revolves around Lt Daniel Kaffee who defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.
